title: Help with font
content:
Ive got a logo for the Indian Tourist Board but its a scanned in copy. I was going to re-create the logo but not sure on what font it is.

Anyone have any ideas??

Cheers, Si

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130808071938im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Incredible_India_Logo_Full_3474.jpg)
author: smcdow01

comments.content:
Bodoni Bold, maybe Bauer Bodoni Bold.

- Lex

Err... not bold, probably medium.

- Lex
